name: Star Wars: Episode I - Gungan Frontier
name_original: Star Wars: Episode I - Gungan Frontier
description:
Star Wars: Episode I - Gungan Frontier is a strategy game developed by Lucas Learning. It came out on 01-05-1999. It was published by LucasArts Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Star Wars: Episode I - Gungan Frontier is available on PC.
